attributes.action: Make the growing of ragwort an offence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Make all persons responsible for ensuring that any ragwort growing on their land or in their gardens is destroyed and never allowed to flower. 
It is quite well known that ragwort is toxic to horses and other animals, but it is less widely known that around TEN PEOPLE die from ragwort poisoning every year

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
